description: Early morning, a young professional (female, early 30s) looks out her apartment window at a busy, smoggy city street with slow-moving traffic. She sighs, frustrated.
location: Urban apartment window, view of congested road

Voiceover.English: Tired of the daily grind? The noise, the fumes, the endless traffic?
Voiceover.Hindi: रोजमर्रा की भागदौड़ से थक गए हैं? शोर, धुआं, और अंतहीन ट्रैफिक से?

description: She sits in an auto-rickshaw stuck in bumper-to-bumper traffic, looking stressed and checking her watch impatiently.

Voiceover.English: Your city commute shouldn't feel like a compromise.
Voiceover.Hindi: शहर की आपकी यात्रा समझौता नहीं होनी चाहिए।

description: Cut to her smiling, riding an Ola Electric Scooter smoothly through open city lanes, bypassing traffic.

Voiceover.English: Introducing Ola Electric Scooter – freedom, style, and zero emissions.
Voiceover.Hindi: पेश है ओला इलेक्ट्रिक स्कूटर – आज़ादी, स्टाइल और शून्य प्रदूषण।

description: She parks at the office, confidently walking in while others arrive late. The scooter stands shining in the background.
location: Office building entrance, scooter parking area

Voiceover.English: Make your commute smarter. Ola Electric – the future of urban mobility.
Voiceover.Hindi: अपनी यात्रा को स्मार्ट बनाइए। ओला इलेक्ट्रिक – शहरी गतिशीलता का भविष्य।
